Title: People's communes are good
Publisher: Hebei renmin meishu chubanshe (河北人民美术出版社)
Notes: An iconic 1958 photograph of Mao Zedong in the countryside of Henan, August 1958, reprinted in 1969. Although published under the name of the New China News Agency, the actual photograph was made by Hou Bo, Mao's main photographer.
